official_title: A Feasibility Study of Orchiectomy in Patients With Prostate Cancer on Chronic LHRH Agonist or Antagonist Therapy
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of metastatic prostatic adenocarcinoma
* Receiving luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone (LHRH) agonist or LHRH antagonist therapy continuously for at least 1 year with anticipated lifelong therapy
* Able to complete written surveys in English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * More than 2 prior systemic treatment regimens utilized in addition to castration.
